text: Aur jab teray rab ney farishton say kaha kay mein zamin mein khalifa bananey wala hun to unhon ney kaha aisay shaks ko kiyon khalifa peda kerta hai jo zamin mein fasaad keray aur khoon bahaye? Aur hum teri tasbeeh hamd aur pakeezgi biyan kerney wala hain. Allah Taalaa ney farmaya jo mein janta hun tum nahi jantay
